short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture a screenshot of the visible webpage area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot Capture is a super simple and efficient Chrome extension that lets you take high-quality screenshots of the visible area on any webpage. Save your screenshots as JPG files instantly, without any hassle.

Features:
Developer Tools Integration: Capture the webpage preview from Chrome DevTools.

One-Click Capture: Quickly capture the visible part of any webpage.

Save as JPG: Easily save screenshots as high-quality images.

Lightweight & Simple: No unnecessary permissions or complicated settings.

Perfect for developers, Webdesigner, or anyone who needs fast and easy screenshots!
